website_summaries.verdict: These superb walkie-talkies are ideal for camping trips, parties, and other kids' events.
pros: Walkie-talkies can be activated by voice or with the push of a button
Small walkie-talkies are easy to grasp
Conserve battery power when not in use
cons: Batteries tend to come out easily

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and fairly easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The "voice activated" feature is awesome! Even though the many options are moderately complicated, once an adult sets them up, you can lock the keyboard to prevent "accidental" changes, which, otherwise, are all but assured with a curious 6 year old! My personal favorite option is turning off the "Beep" when button are pressed. On the negative side, someone should have thought about the excessively loud feedback when the two units are too close together which happened almost instantly upon power-up.
customer_reviews.author: R. Olszewski

customer_reviews.title: Great Range
customer_reviews.text: My kids have absolutely enjoyed these! They play with them in the house and are able to use them while they're in the woods. I love that you can use them with the voice activated speaker. The range has been unbelievable as they have been over a mile away and still sound like they're standing next to you. Plenty of channels to choose from in case there is interference and even an LED flashlight on the top! The kids take them to bed and then talk until they fall asleep. You can also use them with earbuds which is great when they're going non stop! Great design and great quality. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KDUB

customer_reviews.title: They work ok. Deftly does not have a 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: They work ok. Deftly does not have a 3 mile capability. There half a mile at best This will be my last attempt at updating... UPDATE: Once Richie read my review he made it right. I never asked for a refund, new products or anything. He made it right on his own. I highly recommend using this company for anything they sell..
customer_reviews.author: Okidiver

customer_reviews.title: Who says these are just for kids?
customer_reviews.text: I read the features of these walkie talkies but it wasn’t until I received them that I realized how cool and useful these are! My twins were excited to receive their “phones” and after a bit of frustration from explaining how to use them(their 3!) played with these for what seemed like the whole afternoon! For the price the quality is great, I think the light feature is pretty cool and live up to their range(we tried em out at the park) you can hear the other person “loud and clear, over!” Would absolutely recommend this brand to anyone looking for a cheap quality walkie talkies set!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi_Lynn

customer_reviews.title: so thought he'd like this set
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as a gift for a young grandson. He loves to go into the woods with Dad, so thought he'd like this set. They arrived quicker than originally expected in excellent condition. The unit is the right size for his hands and seemed easy to operate. The operating range is more than enough for him to play around the yard. Will look to get another set for his younger brother in a few years when he's old enough.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara D

customer_reviews.title: The walkie talkies are great. But they run through batteries
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boys to play around the hous, yard, block ect. They love them. They don't quite reach the 3 miles but that is ok for a set of kids walkie talkies. The only con it that they eat batteries with my boys steady playing with them. I will have to invest in rechargable batteries. But all in all a good buy for my boys.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great stocking stuffer
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for that adventurous boy or girl. The walkie talkies are ready to use with batteries straight out of the box. The range is decent however the audio isn't the clearest. This is a great idea for sibilings and will get you two gifts in one.
customer_reviews.author: Q. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Junk. Had to send them back. VERY hard ...
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Had to send them back. VERY hard to hear the other person, and when you turn the volume up, the response beep gets crazy loud, which is quite jarring if you have the walkie to your ear trying to hear the other person. Strap broke minutes after attaching it. VOX feature doesn't work well either.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for a birthday gift, and by the time they were given and used, the return date had passed. They were only used a couple of times, and then, one would not turn on, regardless of battery change. Customer service reached out immediately after an email and is sending a replacement. Hopefully, these work like they're supposed to, because our kids were having a ball the little they used them. Will update review if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of four

customer_reviews.title: Defective ?? But fun ..
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. This was a gift for my 2 grandsons birthdays. The first day they worked well and the boys were enjoying them . The second day one of them would not work . It would not change frequency’s and you could not talk to the other ?? If we cannot get it to work I will be returning them,( probably exchange ??) might try again because they are fun. They are small but that is not a problem . What I did hate is the small print on the instructions .. ( like so many products 👎) Can hardly read them with a magnifying glass..really !!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service though
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to gift my nephew overseas but didn't even work for one day. It was so embarrassing to gift someone such a defective gift. Do not recommend Changing the star rating because of amazing customer service. They actually replaced the product free of cost with a new one. Appreciate that. The new product was working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: runs out of batteries in 2 days
customer_reviews.text: these walkie talkies work great but they just suck the batteries right out, have to change them every 2-4 days - even when they are OFF!!! Do your self a favor and get a walkie talkie set that can charge. what a bummer, my daughter is so disappointed, sadly the return window expired days ago :(
customer_reviews.author: Shane Mc Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Vox Box Walkie Talkies - Best feature, they can be locked.
customer_reviews.text: Gifted two sets to grandkids - a 5 year old, twin 3 year olds, and 1 for mom/dad. Primarily for use across their 1.4 acres. They have most features found in GMRS radios. Most importantly, once you set them up (e.g., channels, tones, etc.), you can lock the settings so the kids won't inadvertently change something and be frustrated when they don't work (e.g., set to different channels). Setup does take some effort (there are lots of options) but isn't a problem if you tackle one feature at a time and follow the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Steve G

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality
customer_reviews.text: My son always wanted a nice pair of Walkie Talkies not cheap ones. These are perfect for my son they are the perfect size for his hands and they work pretty well. What is awesome is they come with a nice sturdy pair of binoculars which i was not expecting to have in the boxi must have missed when i was ordering. These Walkie Takies are a great Christmas present
customer_reviews.author: TMcfadden

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!  RIP OFF
customer_reviews.text: I used this item 1 time with my 12 year old grandkid for about 2 hours. the talk button will not engage on one of the units rendering it useless...plus the batteries were almost gone within the first two hours. Since it only has a 30 day warranty, I am out my $$...Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly a great deal. These work as well as other higher end radios I have had in the past. These are great when the kids are out and about in he neighborhood and need to be reached. Long distance and decent battery life.
customer_reviews.author: TheGills

customer_reviews.title: Terrible battery life
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing battery life. We have changed them 4 times since Christmas and it only just turned Feb! We dont even have them on very often for this reason, so its basically 8 batteries each time they play with them. Disappointed because one of the things in the description is that it has battery saving features. Very inconvenient and expensive to even turn them on. Unfortunately we our return window just closed at the end of Jan. I cannot recommend these to any parent because of the cost of batteries, not only to the pocketbook but also to the planet.
customer_reviews.author: janetjackson

customer_reviews.title: Broke inside of 5 months and caused batteries to overheat
customer_reviews.text: Bought February 5, 2020. Let the kids use a handful of times since, always taking them back when they were finished and placing them out of reach. Replaced the batteries last week (Aug 1), but they didn't turn back on and then I noticed the batteries had become too hot to touch. Tried batteries in a flashlight and batteries were fine. Repeated with new batteries and the same thing happened. $20 is too good to be true.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Gladdek

customer_reviews.title: Does not operate as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these so my adventurous child can have an easier way to check in with me. The main selling point and why I ended up purchasing these is because of the range. It advertises 3 miles. It doesn't work at a distance greater than a 1/2 mile. Pretty disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Kay

customer_reviews.title: What's the distance these walkie talkies will cover?
customer_reviews.text: My Husband has a spinal cord injury and is mostly bed bound. What I really like is the piece of mind being able to work outside or be anywhere in the house and he can contact me if he needs help. The USA Toyz Walkie Talkies are perfect for what we need. And the distance works great for going after the mail which is about a mile to and from the mailbox. So far I haven't found anything that I dislike about this item.
customer_reviews.author: Louraine Cahoon

customer_reviews.title: Very clear sound.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is very clear compared to other toy sets we have had. Very compact, also, which is nice. The first set had an issue, with one unit going dead within minutes of initial use. However, the seller was incredibly prompt in replacing the product. So, whether the toys work in the long run, I cannot yet say. So far, so good with the second set. And the seller was terrific!
customer_reviews.author: PAShopper

customer_reviews.title: Got extremely hot, warped batteries inside
customer_reviews.text: We got these for my son for Christmas. It was working fine until all of a sudden it started making this loud beeping sound. When I picked it up it was burning hot! I took the batteries out and tried some different batteries and it started burning up again! The batteries were so hot inside they burst open and started leaking fluid. I am extremely concerned bc if my 4 year old had been playing with them at the time it would have burned him.
customer_reviews.author: Lp

customer_reviews.title: Do not work past ‘
customer_reviews.text: This was absolute crap. We took these walkie talkies to mexico so our son could use them while at kids club which was not even a quarter of a mile away and they did not work. It was absolutely devastating and disappointing for him. I’ll be returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Eberman

customer_reviews.title: Run away this is a dangerous product, Made in China crap!
customer_reviews.text: This item is not safe for kids. First off they don’t have a screw to secure the battery cover, which is required by US law. Additionally, on my sons one of the W-T’s the batteries became extremely hot, I mean burn you and soon would have caught fire hot. I can not be more clear this is Chinese crap that shouldn’t be sold in the US!
customer_reviews.author: Angus

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING AFTER ONE WEEK
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for a week, then stopped working altogether. We swapped out the batteries, tried different channels, nothing. The lamp light continued to work, but no sound would come out of them. JUNK.
customer_reviews.author: URA

customer_reviews.title: Cracked Screen
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed screen was cracked when my son opened for his birthday. Didn’t get to try out because now we need to return them.
customer_reviews.author: timeracer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't  last  long.
customer_reviews.text: Initially, this was a great working little set. We used it over the summer for when my grandchild was out of earshot playing. However, last week, when we replaced the batteries, one of the units immediately overheated. My daughter pulled out the batteries and we let them cool. We thought it might be the brand of batteries.. So, the next day we tried different batteries. Same result. there was no rough play, or dropping, or anything because the unit that overheated was the unit that stayed with an adult. We will buy another set of walkies, but it definitely will not be these.
customer_reviews.author: dancingdiva

customer_reviews.title: not too good - not worth more than 15 bucks
customer_reviews.text: Batteries are very hard to insert (in both units) unless you have good hand strength, too hard for a 6 year old and his grandfather. Battery door falls off (both units) during normal use. Push-to-talk button is on the front of the walkie talkie not on the side (like every other walkie talkie/hand held radio on Earth). Bought them during a visit and left them with nephews or I would return them. Do not recommend these. They do have good reception.
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: Clearest sound for kid's walkie talkie
customer_reviews.text: We bought the walkie talkies for a birthday gift for an 8 year old. My husband and I put batteries in to try them out before giving them to make sure everything worked. We had a bit of trouble removing the back to put the batteries in, but when the pocket clip was removed, it was easier. They seem fairly easy to use, especially with the technically smart generation. We were amazed at the quality of the sound. We could hear each other clearly from a distance of over 30 feet. It was fun for us, so we are looking forward to playing with the boys!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I got it for 6 year old daughter and 4 year old son. And they are still struggling to really get it how to use it. usually one of them gets it to wrong station and its just didnt work out as well as i thought it would. I woldn't say its as user friendly for kids as i hope it would be
customer_reviews.author: Mariya L.

customer_reviews.title: Product worked for 5min and stopped...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the more expensive walkie talkies and still feels very cheap. The device barely works, very hard to operate and the channel is easily changes. I would not recommend buying it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: We got 2 sets and they all connect to each other kids love using it outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This gift was a hit!
customer_reviews.text: Gifted these to sisters 10 and 8 years old and the gift was an immediate hit. The girls are excited about how much better the sound quality on these is vs their old walkie talkies. One ran to the basement while the other was on the 3rd floor and the sound was crystal clear. As other reviewers noted, getting the batteries in was difficult but their dad managed to do it. Also I was surprised by how small these walkie talkies are — no bigger than an old flip phone. And the belt clip is handy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Zale

customer_reviews.title: kids absolutely loved it, does not come with the batteries
customer_reviews.text: kids absolutely loved it, does not come with the batteries, however, once you turn it on the kids love to play with it. Very nice quality, I would totally recommend it
customer_reviews.author: HMJ

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great walkie talkies. Although probably a little Advanced for my 3 & 5 year olds however they are very good in work well
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Fulfilled expectations
customer_reviews.text: The walkie talkies were for a grandson's 4th birthday. He couldn't be more tickled! It took him a while to get the hang of pushing buttons and communicating, but before he left the party, he told me how much he loved the gift, without any prompting from his mother or father. That was how happy he really was. The enthusiasm was glowing from his face, this was the perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Guertin-Brackett

customer_reviews.title: Walkie Talkies for Kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 5 year old grandson. With some guidance we had a lot of fun with these. The quality of sound is amazing and the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift for grandson
customer_reviews.text: Gift for grandson, from what his parents say, he and his brother play with them all day. We've used our own walkie talkies in huge stores to keep track of each other, and when I go out for a walk ... there are a LOT of uses for walkie talkies. That these are made for children still doesn't mean they are exactly "toys;" they will be useful for years, I think.
customer_reviews.author: StillLife

customer_reviews.title: Junk.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 1 week and USA Toys failed to respond to my message regarding the return. Stuck with a $30 piece of junk. UPDATE: USA Toyz has made this right and sent out a replacement. Not sure how long this one will last, but the company definitely did the right thing.
customer_reviews.author: toni crispino

customer_reviews.title: Walkie Talkies
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this set of walkie talkies for my nephew. His Grand Dad said they were as good set. He is at the explorer age & I think he will like them. One thing, make sure you purchase batteries, because each unit uses 4- AAAA batteries. I purchased a package of 20 to go with these.
customer_reviews.author: DEE 331

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kids
customer_reviews.text: My boys (5,7,8,11) love this. It's one of their favorite Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: William C. Sain

customer_reviews.title: Great kids toy and adults can use them too
customer_reviews.text: My children love them. I haven’t checked the range on them yet. I will wait till spring is here to do so when we can get back out in the woods. Northern Minnesota winters ya know
customer_reviews.author: best videos!!!!¡!!!

customer_reviews.title: Belt clips break easily
customer_reviews.text: Nice little walkie talkies. But the belt clip feature snapped within a day of my son using these. He is 6 and can be rough on things but the same set I got for my niece and nephew didnt even last the whole day. I consider that an important part of a walkie talkie, especially when kids are running around with them. Besides that, these things have held up to a lot banging around and being dropped in mud puddles( 2 yr old).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product did not fully operate as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday gift for my grandson so it was not opened right away. Unfortunately only one of the walk-in talkies worked even after inserting brand new batteries several times. Very disappointing especially for the price I paid for them. My grandson was not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda A Wright

customer_reviews.title: Above and Beyond!!!
customer_reviews.text: USA Toys is nothing short of amazing. One of the walkie talkies we received didn’t work, so they immediately sent me a replacement. Unfortunately, those didn’t work either. I was supposed to send them back and with all that was going on, and having two children and a husband who are immune compromised, it slipped my mind. The company reached out to me and told me not to worry about sending the others back, but they wanted to rectitude the situation and sent me another set free of charge! I was floored and so appreciative. I definitely plan of making future purchases.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer b.

customer_reviews.title: Returned...cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: First of all the box was damage and very small. I expected maybe a bigger box. But it was in a very small very flimsy damaged box. The walkie talkies were also very small. Very plastic. Very cheap quality. Something maybe you would have got at the dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: mysweetlittle4

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable for small kids, drains batteries quick
customer_reviews.text: These are OK. I have 2 kids under 4 and they didn't last very long being dropped and tossed around. The battery contacts on the inside broke off just from being dropped a few times. Clip is in a bad spot blocking the battery door. Drains batteries instantly if left on by accident. Wouldn't recommend for smaller children.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Thresher

customer_reviews.title: I Like These!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you keep the instructions around until you get used to these. Keep one in my bedroom to talk to my grandson so he won't get scared at bed time. Good value and sound great.
customer_reviews.author: buzzybell

customer_reviews.title: Fun! Fun!
customer_reviews.text: We haven't fully tested the range, but these walkie talkie are tons of fun. My kids got them and once we fully activated them, they were able to sit inside different closets and "chit chat" as they call it. It kept them busy long enough for me to start dinner with no interruptions. I'll call this purchase a win!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy T.

customer_reviews.title: 4-year-old loves these
customer_reviews.text: We got these for my 4-year-old son's birthday. We mostly use them at bedtime so he can talk to us in his room while we are downstairs and he can tell us if he needs something like a glass of water. I can even take him to the park down the street and he can talk to his dad at home. He LOVES them. We recently took them away for a few days for bad behavior, and unlike other toys he forgets about immediately, he was begging to have his walkie talkie back. And I was happy to give it to him. He has used these every day since he got them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: The seller was amazing and shipped quickly and packed nicely. Not to be rude but the product is crap. Its a children's toy and both walkie talkies batteries were dead after only 4 days. That's not even possible. Of course a child is going to leave them on constantly and you expect me to replace the batteries every 4 days?? No way. I shouldve just bought an expensive pair because now my child is upset that I won't keep replacing the batteries. Do not buy. Go for better set.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Krug

customer_reviews.title: Great Walkie Talkies for the kids or adults
customer_reviews.text: These Walkie Talkies are great for keeping track of children outside playing. They have a clear tone and are easy for the kids to operate. The many channel options help being able to have an interference free conversation. They are a great size for putting in a pocket or you can use the belt clip. Made well and are sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: P. Soliday

customer_reviews.title: My son loves these and he is 9 unfortunately they ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these and he is 9 unfortunately they don’t go the 3 mile range but maybe a mile. We use them for my son and I can communicate when he is at school and I am home. Our backyard goes up to the schools field. He is to young for a phone
customer_reviews.author: native shell

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my 4 year old granddaughter but I don't know who has more fun with them - me or her! Easy to use, just the right size for smaller hands and brightly colored so you can't lose them in the couch! And, the flashlight is a bonus and made our "adventures" extra fun! She would say "Roger that!"
customer_reviews.author: PJP

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Got these for 2 grandsons for Christmas. They love talking to each other and had a great time at Christmas with their cousins who got walkie talkies also.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Braxton

customer_reviews.title: Junk!! Both didn’t work out of the box!! Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!! Didn’t work brand new out of the box! Both had a “quality check” sticker too. LOL Waste of Money and my kids were super excited to use them. I was really looking forward to giving my kids these and they were nothing but a major disappointment. Go with another brand!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua West

customer_reviews.title: Great walkie talkies!
customer_reviews.text: These work great and my boys love running around the house and outside using them. They are easy for my 5 and 7 year olds to use, the sound quality is great, and the little flash light is bright.
customer_reviews.author: KV

customer_reviews.title: bought these for my great niece and nephew
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my great niece and nephew as it was their brothers 1st birthday and I did not want them to be left out. They really really liked them, I was told that their father had to change the batteries as they are constantly in use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great walkie talkie
customer_reviews.text: The grand daughters love playing with these. The range is great if they go down the road or to the neighbors house. They are small enough so their little hands can hold them. They like the LED flashlight at nite to use in their tent. Great toy to entertain them for hours. The batteries were easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: pam foster

customer_reviews.title: They work and have good range!
customer_reviews.text: Ok first of all my son LOVES these! They have good range too. I live in a four story townhouse and my bedroom is on the top floor. My son will be on the 1st floor and I can talk to him and ask him to bring me water LOL. But yes, they work well, super easy to use and my six-year-old loves communicating with me and his siblings using them.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Rylon

customer_reviews.title: Best walkie-talkie for children
customer_reviews.text: Best walkie-talkie for children. It takes 4 triple A's each. Really easy to use this walkie talkie you do not even need a button. It so cheap for the price. The better thing is you can even use your earphone bud. You can easily find channels and very easy to use. Get this for little kids.
customer_reviews.author: timila

customer_reviews.title: Good Little Kids Toy
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what you expect. A fun little toy for the kids to run around with playing hide and seek or spy's. My niece and nephew enjoyed them and for the price I think they were okay value.
customer_reviews.author: LukePhoto

customer_reviews.title: It was great for a little while
customer_reviews.text: It was great for a little while, but broke after a few uses with the kids. Batteries can pop out easily so it seems like it stops working.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: youth walkie talkies
customer_reviews.text: This purchase is a Christmas gift. After receiving these items, I opened them to inspect and test them. They have a great look, and appear to be well constructed. Upon testing,they have great clarity, easy to use, among other nice options.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.Clark

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my daughter for Christmas and one was not working properly. I reached out to Customer Service and although the return date had expired, they quickly sent out a new set. I was so pleased with the excellent customer service and my daughter is enjoying her new walkie talkies. They work well and are exactly what she wanted!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality appearance for toys
customer_reviews.text: One of the walkies overheated right away, the batteries got hot, so we returned this set and bought a "real" set for the grand-daughter. On the positives, the packaging is nice (giftable), the colors are fun. We would have kept this pair but for the battery glitch
customer_reviews.author: Pamela McDonald

customer_reviews.title: They actually perform!
customer_reviews.text: It took a bit of instruction on my part, but as I got comfortable with these walkie talkies, it was easy to explain it to my 7 year old grandson. We play hide & seek, and whisper to each other to give hints - he thinks this is hilarious!
customer_reviews.author: Dukeman

customer_reviews.title: My girls have enjoyed these. We got about 1/2 mile distance where ...
customer_reviews.text: My girls have enjoyed these. We got about 1/2 mile distance where we live which is rural and wooded. They seem to have lost interest in them after the first couple weeks but I'm sure we will find fun uses for them like at the beach on vacation in the future!
customer_reviews.author: H Copen

customer_reviews.title: Hours of Entertainment - Over and Out
customer_reviews.text: These walkie talkies were a gift for our sons from the Easter Bunny. Our 4.5 year old immediately loved the idea of it, but couldn't (initially) figure out he had to hold down the talk button. Once he figured that out, he went on about 15 missions in the house. "Over and Out" is now a common saying in our home. He is loving the walkie talkies and frequently turning to them. The almost 3 year old is somewhat interested, but confused on holding down the Talk still. But we think he'll get it soon.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Tetlow

customer_reviews.title: defective product/battery exploded inside.
customer_reviews.text: SO DISAPPOINTED!. Bought this for my God son's birthday. What a nightmare. Package arrived late, had to reach out to customer service repeatedly to sort out delivery. Was given credit back for the inconvenience... but then when he finally opened gift and played with them..they exploded/melted due to a faulty battery connection. Very unhappy. This is listed as a practical gift for young boys. Very bad experience.
customer_reviews.author: judith winchester

customer_reviews.title: I bought this one instead and it was perfect. Every button worked the minute you put in ...
customer_reviews.text: I had originally bought another brand for my grandson's 5th BD, and it was a total bust, and returned it. I bought this one instead and it was perfect. Every button worked the minute you put in the batteries. The on/off switch is not the menu button, like so many. The screen lite up the minute it turns on. It has volume control buttons, as well as a monitor button. It pretty much has a separate button for every function, including a flashlight. It was a total of $9.00 less, that included a $4.00 off coupon, then my first purchase.I guess sometimes you don't always get what you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and we are sure he will love it. The product is very well made
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for asking, my purchase is a gift for my grandson, and he has no idea he is receiving it, and we are sure he will love it. The product is very well made, and he will like it. Quality is always my first choice, and we rated your product 5.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia W.

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Walkie Talkies were perfect for my 4 year old grandson. Easy to operate and perfect size for small hands. One of the walkie talkies had a bad battery connection and I was past the 30 day return window. The seller responded very quickly and sent me a new set. They could not have been nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, only 1 of the 2 work; the other will not turn on at all.
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We bought this around Christmas last year, for our two daughters, and have had fun taking them hiking and playing with them around the house. Unfortunately one of them stopped working after about six months. We contacted the customer service and emailed Alou, May, and Nyx, who were all extremely helpful in getting a new set sent out. The walkie talkies work as you would expect them to, and the company's attitude really exceeds expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: These have great range and my 3 and 5 year olds can use them easily enough. You can also lock them on the same channel which is helpful and they have a little light Incase you’re playing in the dark!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Good Customer Serice 🤩
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for me and my friend so that our kids can use them. We only live 0.5 miles we mapped it and this walkie talkie is advertised 3 miles+ and we have tried different channels and still not working 😩 Update: Cuatomer Service quickly contacted me and was very eager to resolve my issue. I am very pleased with the courteous people and the quick resolution. That Level of service is rarer these days.
customer_reviews.author: Roselle Hoagland

customer_reviews.title: They are a little smaller and can be easily held by little hands
customer_reviews.text: These walkie talkies are the real thing. They are a little smaller and can be easily held by little hands. The buttons are easy to push and they worked right out of the box after filling with AAA batteries, not included. They are a nice bright color to easily spot if misplaced.
customer_reviews.author: Mayjar

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I loved the fact that you can talk without pressing the push button since I got these for my 2 yr old to play with. But distance does go as far as described. Wish they worked better.
customer_reviews.author: DQ

customer_reviews.title: My kids love them and they are a great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, my kids love them. Sound is clear and I like that they have volume control, additional channels and can work at longer distances than many other Walkie Talkies. My kids have lots of fun with them. They are a good product and value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Mayer-Fortuna

customer_reviews.title: Family fun
customer_reviews.text: My 7yr old grandson loves his Walkie talkies. He plays with his sister and daddy. Fun to watch them.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 sets and none of the walkie talkies worked right out of the box. The metal connectors on all 4 units do not make contact with all of the batteries rendering them useless.
customer_reviews.author: S Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old granddaughter loves these. She talks to her cousins that live just a short way from her. She has had a great time. One draw back would be the battery life, wish it would last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Quiltcloth

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift I purchased for my nephew for Christmas. The worked great and I would definitely purchase again. They really work well and at the distance they claim.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works , sounds good! Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 sets and my kids love them takes lots of batteries but they love it! Sounds good and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The walkie talkies are great! My son and niece love running around and hearing each other. They were more than what we expected. They are easy to nativigate the settings and uses. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Amazonite

customer_reviews.title: Little brothers love them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a birthday gift for my brothers, since we would be driving 2000 miles in a week in two different vehicles and they worked excellent. They had great range, and the controls were easy to use. The only issue was they eventually annoyed use by talking in them too much!
customer_reviews.author: Rootinchase

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: It was gift for my friend's son. He just mentioned it stopped working. Little embarrassing!
customer_reviews.author: BestDeal

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I often cannot hear the other person ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I often cannot hear the other person clearly when we are talking to each other while in different rooms. The walkie talkies cleared up the problem and it is now a pleasure to communicate rather than a frustration. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: BJ's opinion

customer_reviews.title: constantly changing batteries
customer_reviews.text: I got the walkie talkie for my parents, they work great, but the only problem is that I am constantly changing the batteries, and I definitely use top of the line batteries. It seems they only last a few days then it turns off and then I need to change the batteries, which is quite annoying. If I didn't need to change them so often it would be great
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service saved the day!
customer_reviews.text: Our first set of these had an electrical short and went kaput, but a great customer service rep (Richie) quickly fixed the problem and got us back on track! My kids love them...now my two year old says “over” after every senstence...😂
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A Scott

customer_reviews.title: Not for the age listed
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad item, but not really for younger children. Consumes batteries like a hungry vampire!
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: NOT 2 MILE RANGE NOT EVEN A HALF MILE
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to coordinate with a guest who is visiting from outside of the US and doesn’t have cellphone access. He is staying less than a quarter mile away and the walkie talkies dont work at all. I’m extremely disappointed and frustrated. Please take down the claim of “2+ miles” range.
customer_reviews.author: C. Moran

customer_reviews.title: Clear at 3/4 mile!
customer_reviews.text: Very very nice set of walkie talkies. Fresh batteries we talked at 3/4 mile between houses outside. Closer than 3/4 mile crystal clear. Many nice features, easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Edward L Bandy

customer_reviews.title: didn't like
customer_reviews.text: the batteries drain so fast ,they were hard to use ,I really just didn't like them
customer_reviews.author: Travis and Monica

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, great colors
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son and his friend ( we share a fence in backyard) to communicate. They are having a blast with it. I like that I can lock it, however, it could be easily be unlocked by kids. Also, I find the batteries don’t last very long on standby..
customer_reviews.author: Carlyn

customer_reviews.title: Great gift and shipping was timely
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for 7yo grandson and will say was a hit!!️He loves these and uses all the time. Loves riding on 4wheeler and able to talk to his papa. Great gift and shipping was timely.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Bought for caravan road trip with kids
customer_reviews.text: Going on a two car road trip and got for the kids in both cars to Radio each other. Haven’t used in the car yet to test the range but they are nice and small and light weight for packing and tried them out around the house and they work great. Looking forward to using in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Alonzo

customer_reviews.title: Old fashioned "NEW" toy!
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren age 4nd 6 absolutely love the toy!!!!! They received it by mail a week ago and are still playing around with it. I hope they will continue enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: veronica ayres

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 1 day and then stopped working. Tried new batteries and still doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy Rivera

product_meta.title: USA Toyz – “Vox Box” Walkie Talkies for Kids (Blue and Yellow)
feature_bullets: KIDS WALKIE TALKIES OUTDOOR KIT: These easy-to-use indoor / outdoor toys for kids include 2 walkie talkies with backlit LCD screens and built-in LED flashlights; long range walkie talkie set has a 2 mile range
EASY VOICE-ACTIVATED TECH: This two way radio set automatically sends your voice even without pushing a button; these long distance walkie talkies pick up your voice and transmit within 2 miles

MULTICHANNEL TWO WAY RADIO: Use multiple walkie talkies to communicate with friends and family members through 22 channels and 99 subchannels; lightweight and durable to use on trips, use in the neighborhood, in the backyard, or inside the house
HI-TECH SPECS: Labeled buttons, earbud jack, and detachable belt clip are included; each two way radio requires (4) AAA batteries; recommended for ages 3+
KID SAFE AND QUALITY ASSURED: Enjoy this kids walkie talkie set for boys and girls; we’ll provide a full refund if you’re not thrilled with our Vox Box walkie talkies for kids

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars779 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
